text: Tangla Railway Station is a railway station located at Tangla in Udalguri district of Assam, India. It is about from the state capital Guwahati. The station has daily trains to Kamakhya, New Jalpaiguri, Dekargaon, Rangiya and Naharlagun. ==Opened== The railway station was re-opened on 4 January 2014 after gauge conversion from meter-gauge to broad-gauge. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Railway stations in Udalguri district Category:Rangiya railway division
title: Tangla railway station
